description.value: By taking a standard action to touch a creature or object, a shatori gains a +4 species bonus to their next check to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.IdprCKGj66qptyN5]{identify} the creature, their next check to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.VWJLbwCeu7DsunHk]{Recall Knowledge} about the creature or the object, or their next @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.nBrYkGfNBJAHe0xJ]{Sense Motive} check against the creature. To touch an unwilling creature, the shatori must succeed at a melee attack roll against that creature’s EAC.

modifiers.name: Psychometry
modifiers.notes: By taking a standard action to touch a creature or object, a shatori gains a +4 species bonus to their next check to  identify the creature, their next check to  Recall Knowledge about the creature or the object, or their next  Sense Motive check against the creature. To touch an unwilling creature, the shatori must succeed at a melee attack roll against that creature’s EAC.

To touch an unwilling creature, the shatori must succeed at a melee attack roll against that creature’s EAC.
